Uses of Class
mgui.pipelines.PipelineState

Packages that use PipelineState
Package Description
mgui.pipelines
Provides a framework for defining and running processing pipelines in the ModelGUI environment.

  • Uses of PipelineState in mgui.pipelines

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected PipelineState InterfacePipeline.state  
    Methods in mgui.pipelines that return PipelineState
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    PipelineState InterfacePipeline.getState()
    Returns the state of this pipeline, or the root pipeline if this is not the root.
